name: Hektika Elektronika
description:
A dangerous authoritarian malware has infected the Obelix Mainframe, and you, a Hektik program named Alys must defend Obelix and rid it from the viruses that damage it.

This game is an arcade shooter that is inspired from games like UBERMOSH and Galaga Legions, with platform gameplay. You are set on a stage that changes every 10 seconds, and you must kill as much as you can or survive as long as you can.

Controls:

A/D keys - Move
W key/Spacebar - Use jetpack
E key - pick up weapon
Left click - fire weapon
Right click - fire Special Shot (when the Special Shot gauge is filled)

Credits:
Game made by InkiCrow

Music composed by InkiCrow

Sounds made with Bfxr
